amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to provide whistleblower protections to employees who report violations of the Labor Management Reporting and Disclosure Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment provides whistleblower protections to employees who report violations of the Labor Management Reporting and Disclosure Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 404 - 18 (Roll no. 47).

action.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
